channel.title: How to add dicing?!?!?!?!? Can somone help me
channel.description: I need to add a dicer like npc that u can like right click an item and use it and it will automatically roll or just the normal dice bag for donators thanks,

item.source: How to add dicing?!?!?!?!? Can somone help me

item.title: How to add dicing?!?!?!?!? Can somone help me
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Find the item click (2) packet and add a case for the dicing bag which you will add as a custom model to your game (or use one existant in the game cache). The right-click text will probably have to be set through the client. There you can then check if the player is a donator, (probably something like p.isDonator()) and if so then construct a new Random object and check the outcome. Then you can reward your player accordingly.

Example code (in your item click packet):
(You will need to import the java.util.Random package to make use of the Random object)
[code=java]
case ITEM_ID:
// Checking if the player is a donator
if (player.isDonator()) {
final int MAXIMUM_NUMBER = 100; // Maximum number you can roll
final int WINNING_CONDITION = 30; // All numbers below this will win

          // Generating a random number and checking if the player has won
          Random rand = new Random();
          if (rand.nextInt(MAXIMUM_NUMBER) < WINNING_CONDITION) {
            // Reward the player, he has won?
                // e.g. adding some money
                player.addItem(995, 100000);
          }
    }
[/code]

Take into account that this is all pseudo code and as such might not work if you just copy and paste this code.

Read full topic

@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“pow err, post:8, topic:536659”]I just need help on this one thing, it’s not that big of a deal that’s why they created this section yes I do know how you feel but its really hard to figure out stuff when you get a random link and no instructions, once you help a person out they know how to do stuff and once they get more and more familiar with the topic/coding they help people its a cycle. Sure someone must of helped you or gave you instructions…[/quote]I think I can say that when I was a noob and asked for help programming, spoonfeeding didn’t help me at all even though I thought it was what I wanted. If you don’t learn how to learn (ie - how to read the javadocs) then there’s no cycle lol

It’s annoying taking time and effort to write tutorials and actually develop good servers and then seeing people in this section have everything handed to them, while they run off with their server donations all while making little to no effort.

So how do I add it…? Thanks for the link but im just confused.
[/quote]

You start learning. This isn’t a spoon feeding community.[/quote]

Yah you’re right this isn’t a spoon feeding community but the link the guy showed him literally just showed him the Random class, I’m pretty sure he wants a head start on how to make the actually gambling system.

Bro there is a ton of tutorials out there on this so just look it up. Here’s a couple

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/474640-pi-npc-dicing-similar-silabgarzas.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/354401-pi-dicing-real-way-through-clan-chats.html
